code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Logistics_FleetManagement] --> Initializing: Component mounted

    Initializing --> Loading: Subscribe to DMs
    Loading --> Empty: No messages
    Loading --> ThreadList: Messages loaded
    Loading --> Error: Subscription failed

    Empty --> ThreadList: First message received

    ThreadList --> ThreadSelected: User selects thread
    ThreadSelected --> ThreadList: Back to list
    ThreadSelected --> Composing: User types message

    Composing --> Encrypting: User sends
    Encrypting --> Publishing: Encryption complete
    Publishing --> ThreadSelected: Publish success
    Publishing --> Error: Publish failed

    ThreadSelected --> MarkingRead: Auto-mark as read
    MarkingRead --> ThreadSelected: Update complete

    ThreadList --> Refreshing: Pull to refresh
    Refreshing --> ThreadList: Refresh complete

    ThreadSelected --> Deleting: User deletes thread
    Deleting --> ThreadList: Delete complete

    Error --> ThreadList: Retry success
    Error --> [Logistics_FleetManagement]: Fatal error

    note right of Encrypting
        NIP04Service encrypts
        message using recipient's
        public key
    end note

    note right of Publishing
        EventPublisherService
        publishes kind 4 event
        to relays
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
